page.title: 18 Shops
page.content: The{2 shops}in the area are at least 100 years old having been modernised. Friday is busiest when bread and meat are delivered.Children are confident with money say the proprietors.Shops close half day on Saturday and market day as trade is poor,takings vary each day.There is a{public phone}near each shop and 2 others in this area.{Cars,} a necessity,business and most leisure activities are beyond our area.{Cattle {trading}depends on haulage firms to move livestock to various markets.The {Milk Marketing Board}collects milk daily into cooled tankers.{Postal {service}is regular but only 1 delivery a day and 2 collections.Postmen in vans deliver{parcels,election notices {& advertising material.Mail Order {firms}send their own trucks.In 1973 road improvements made Yeolmbridge negotiable for lorries and coaches.
